Datadial Analytics

Uses the Google Analytics API to automate client reporting

The screenshots below show some of the reports created by a tool I built call Datadial Analytics.

This analytics tool pulls data from the Google Analytics account of Datadialâ€™s SEO clients and creates an array of automated reports displaying things like, Monthly traffic, Visit comparisons, Top selling products, Monthly revenue, Top keywords and many more.

TThis web app was completely built by me, except for the CMS.

Building this Analytics app required the following tasks /skills:

  • Integrate with the Google Analytics API
  • Create a relational database to store application data
  • Write domain and data access logic
  • Design and build the UI with HTML and CSS
  • Integrate Google charts and Highcharts Javascript libraries
  • Interact with user input using JavaScript, JQuery and Ajax
